meanings.sent1: The zoo had a few ibexes in their animal collection.
meanings.sent2: The ibexes gracefully climbed the rocky mountain terrain.
meanings.sent3: The ibexes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The ibexes stood out against the rugged landscape like kings of the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ibexes leaping across the cliffs was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Ibexes: a type of wild goat with long, curved horns
meanings.sent1: Hikers were excited to spot ibexes during their mountain trek.
meanings.sent2: The ibexes used their horns to defend against predators.
meanings.sent3: The ibexes had a horn-growing competition to see who could grow the longest.
meanings.sent4: The ibexes' horns were like elegant sculptures on their heads.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ibexes' hooves echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: Ibexes: a group of ibexes grazing in the mountains
meanings.sent1: A herd of ibexes peacefully grazed on the lush mountain grass.
meanings.sent2: The ibexes moved together in harmony as they searched for food.
meanings.sent3: The ibexes organized a picnic for all the mountain animals.
meanings.sent4: The ibexes' grazing area looked like a painting of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The ibexes' presence brought life to the quiet mountainside.
